1666220.name: Soulpath Soundtrack
1666220.description:
Soulpath: the final journey original soundtrack is composed and produced by Andoni Plaza of Acid Warlock.
Like the videogame, the music adapts to different emotions like joy, rage, sadness or fear. This musical journey creates a unique soundtrack experience, with lots of variations and music styles.
Andoni put a lot of imagination and creativity to conform this magical journey that perfectly powers up the virtual reality world of the game.

We hope you enjoy the listening of this soundtrack, available for free on Steam.
